channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-23179] Show create table is not showing SerDe Properties in unicode
item.description:
Table with special character delimiters are not shown in show create output

eg., 
create external table test(age int, name string) ROW FORMAT DELIMITED FIELDS TERMINATED BY '\u0001' stored as textfile;
Show create output
----------------------------------------------------

createtab_stmt

----------------------------------------------------

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE `test`(
`age` int,
`name` string)
ROW FORMAT SERDE
'org.apache.hadoop.hive.serde2.lazy.LazySimpleSerDe'
WITH SERDEPROPERTIES (
'field.delim'='',
'serialization.format'='')
STORED AS INPUTFORMAT
'org.apache.hadoop.mapred.TextInputFormat'
OUTPUTFORMAT
'org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.io.HiveIgnoreKeyTextOutputFormat'
LOCATION
'hdfs://abcd:8020/warehouse/tablespace/external/hive/testca'
TBLPROPERTIES (
'bucketing_version'='2',
'discover.partitions'='true',
'transient_lastDdlTime'='1577162310')

----------------------------------------------------
Few client console not able to show ^A (Ctrl + A) properly. It's better to show the output in unicode as shown in desc formatted.

Storage Desc Params: NULL NULL
  field.delim \u0001
  serialization.format \u0001
item.summary: Show create table is not showing SerDe Properties in unicode

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: lgtm, but please use org.apache.commons.text.StringEscapeUtils as org.apache.commons.lang3.StringEscapeUtils is deprecated. Are we sure that serde property values may not contain ' or ; characters?
